title: KHR_materials_clearcoat_anisotropy glTF Material Extension
description: glTF extension that defines anisotropy for the clearcoat material layer.

clearcoatAnisotropyStrength.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat anisotropy strength. When the clearcoat anisotropy texture is present, this value is multiplied by the texture's blue channel.

clearcoatAnisotropyRotation.description: The rotation of the clearcoat anisotropy.
clearcoatAnisotropyRotation.gltf_detailedDescription: The rotation of the clearcoat anisotropy in tangent, bitangent space, measured in radians counter-clockwise from the tangent. When the clearcoat anisotropy texture is present, this value provides additional rotation to the vectors in the texture.

clearcoatAnisotropyTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The clearcoat anisotropy texture. Red and green channels represent the clearcoat anisotropy direction in $[-1, 1]$ tangent, bitangent space, to be rotated by the clearcoat anisotropy rotation. The blue channel contains strength as $[0, 1]$ to be multiplied by the clearcoat anisotropy strength.
